text: This is a list of Algerian cities and towns with more than 100,000 inhabitants, and towns and villages with more than 20,000 inhabitants. == List of Algerian cities and towns with more than 100,000 inhabitants == Ranking Name Population English Berber Arabic 1987 census'' 1998 census'' 2005 estimate'' 1\. Algiers Dzayer الجزائر 1,507,241 2,580,570 3,518,083 2\. Oran Wehran وهران 628,558 692,516 771,066 3\. Constantine Qsenṭina قسنطينة 443,727 462,187 507,224 4\.
